revised_title: The Effects of Musk in Convulsive Disorders and Its Therapeutic Potential
tldr: The author discusses the use of musk in treating convulsive disorders, such as convulsions, hiccups, and nervous disorders. They found that larger doses of musk were more effective in treating these conditions, as opposed to the smaller doses commonly used at the time. The author shares several case studies where musk was successfully used to treat patients with convulsive disorders, leading to a reduction in symptoms and improved overall health.
